body.Body:
Hi Iron Mountain Vestby,

Equinor request for scan of archived document.
Order number: @{items('For_each')?['ordernumber']}

Please scan this document and upload to sftp site. (Remember to set the filename with the order number, for example: 782e0bcc-a0a5-40f4-ad74-973355011da8.pdf, the file is needed in PDF format).

Storage information:
Physical Location: @{body('Parse_JSON')?['LRMPhysicalLocation']}
Storage ID: @{body('Parse_JSON')?['LRMStorageID']}

Document information
Media type: @{body('Parse_JSON')?['LRMMediaType']}
Filename: @{items('For_each')?['documentname']}
Title: @{body('Parse_JSON')?['Title']}
Authors: @{body('Parse_JSON')?['LRMAlternateAuthor']}
Creation Date: @{body('Parse_JSON')?['Created']}
Registration Date: @{body('Parse_JSON')?['LRMArchivedDate']}
Record Notes:
Document No: @{body('Parse_JSON')?['LRMDocumentNumber']}

Our reference
WBS: @{items('For_each')?['wbs']}
Company code: @{items('For_each')?['companycode']}
Requester: @{items('For_each')?['businessunit']}
Owner: @{body('Parse_JSON')?['EIMBusinessArea']}
Container: @{body('Parse_JSON')?['LRMOilDocfullpath']}
Unique Identifier: @{items('For_each')?['ordernumber']}
Record URL: @{body('Parse_JSON')?['FilePath']}

Best Regards,
Equinor Corporate Archival Team
